name: Debate Simulator 2016 Democrat Edition
description:
A game based off the 2016 election. This is no longer being worked on as I lost the project files. in development, and However donations are accepted. My goal is a small loan of 1 million dollars. With that I can pay for college, and start a business as a Game Developer.

To play the game use WSAD or the arrow keys to move, and Space Bar to shoot.

Click the blue button on the main menu to start the game. Alt F4 to close.
